title: 2020GD

content: Hello everybody! Right now, FANTASTIC Tournaments are being held in FoggyStar - The Marathon of Stars and the Stars Way. We invite everyone to take part in them, and also share your opinion here!The Marathon of Stars- Prize Pool - €9,500- The minimum bet is 1 USDT, and the maximum bet is 10 USDT- Time remaining - 19 daysMore details here The Stars Way- Prize Pool - 1200 Loyalty Points- Each player receives 500 free rounds in tournament games by PragmaticPlay provider- Time remaining - 1 dayMore details here  A New Tournament with a Unique BITTALK150 Promo Only for Bitcointalk- 150% First Deposit Bonus- 1st place - 1k Loyalty Points- 2d place - 750  Loyalty Points- 3rd place - 500  Loyalty PointsMore details here We hope you will enjoy and play with great pleasure! Your FoggyStar Team

comments.body: The "More détails" link doesn't actually gives more details but rather just redirects to the signup page.So is there anywhere we can get more details about the Bitcoin talk promo?
